title: Time penalty for leaving my own custom 1v1 match against a bot?? da fuq rito plz.

replies.body:
Hi xP3te

Leaverbuster does not punish for custom games even though the warning dialog appears when you choose to exit the game. Details [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

I checked out your account, and in the last 10 days you've left a Nemesis draft and 3 ARAMs, chance are these are what put you in low priority queue.
